name: Pudge
profile: Your kitty is a delightful animal that may have a little extra around the middle. Any Pudge-cat will benefit from the fitness regime at Yoga Kitten and will in time, become a spiritual leader to some of the less enlightened fuzz-balls.

name: Grumpy
profile: Your kitty is suffering on a fundamental spiritual level and needs an intense regimen at Yoga Kitten.

name: Hipster
profile: Your kitty is obsessed with being cool.

name: Bub
profile: Bub cats are all around odd-balls.

name: Colonel Meow
profile: There is no place for a Colonel Meow attitude at Yoga Kitten.
